home.title: Glitch Text Generator
home.description: Create unique glitch text effects. Supporting multiple styles including Zalgo, Vaporwave, Matrix, and more. Easy to use, try it now!

input.title: Input Text
input.description: Enter the text you want to transform. Supports multiple languages including English, Chinese, and more.

select.title: Choose Effect
select.description: Select from various glitch effects and adjust intensity parameters to achieve your desired effect.

copy.title: Copy & Use
copy.description: Click the copy button to get the transformed text, ready to use in social media, design work, and more.

zalgo.title: Zalgo
zalgo.description: Classic glitch text effect, adding combining characters above and below text to create an eerie visual effect.

vaporwave.title: Vaporwave
vaporwave.description: Converts text to full-width characters, creating a retro vaporwave aesthetic style.

matrix.title: Matrix
matrix.description: Simulates The Matrix style, randomly converting text to Japanese kana and numbers.

binary.title: Binary
binary.description: Converts parts of text to binary numbers, creating a digital glitch effect.

corrupt.title: Corrupt
corrupt.description: Simulates file corruption effect by randomly replacing character encodings.

gallery.title: Text Effect Showcase
gallery.description: Explore creative applications of various text glitch effects. Click on works to view details and copy effect text.

cyberpunk.title: Cyberpunk Title
cyberpunk.description: Cyberpunk style title created with Zalgo effect, perfect for sci-fi themed designs

vaporwave.title: Vaporwave Brand
vaporwave.description: Retro vaporwave effect using full-width characters, ideal for brand design

matrix.title: Matrix Code
matrix.description: Text effect simulating The Matrix style, suitable for tech themes

digital.title: Digital Glitch
digital.description: Converting text to binary style, creating digital glitch effects
